title: Journal of Agent Fritz
content:
[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]


[[=]]
+ Journal of Agent Fritz
[[/=]]
----

@@ @@
[[=image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a423dea78e5984d/image.png style="width: 50px;"]]
[[=]]
[[size 200%]]Frisland[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]-- 2022 --[[/size]]
[[/=]]
------
@@ @@

[[div class="hmfscp_memo3"]]

+++ ##ffffff|**Report of Facility-111:**##
##ffffff|**Demography of the Anglo-Sidhe Condominium of Frisland, 1877.**##

@@ @@

[[<]]

[[span style="color:white"]]

**//Homo sapiens sapiens// (65%)**
⠀⠀> Frislander - 60%
⠀⠀> British - 2.6%
⠀⠀> Irish - 0.5%
⠀⠀> Icelander - 1.1%
⠀⠀> Vinlander - 0.6%
⠀⠀> Others - 0.2%

**//Homo sapiens sidhe// (24.2%)**
⠀⠀> Frislandic - 21.1%
⠀⠀> Brasilic - 1.3%
⠀⠀> Avalonic - 1.2%
⠀⠀> Thulic - 0.2%
⠀⠀> Buyanic - 0.14%
⠀⠀> Annwnic - 0.09%
⠀⠀> Tíric - None recorded
⠀⠀> Others - 0.17%

**//Homo sapiens álfr// (6.5%)**
⠀⠀> Ljósalfar - 3.4%
⠀⠀> Dǫkkalfar - 1.9%
⠀⠀> Svartalfar - 0.4%
⠀⠀> Others - 0.8%

**//Homo sapiens aquarius// (1.2%)**
⠀⠀> Orcadian Finnfolk - 0.8%
⠀⠀> Hibernian Finnfolk (merrow/murúch) - 0.3%
⠀⠀> Others - 0.1%

**//Others// (3.1%)**
⠀⠀> Jötnar - 0.82%
⠀⠀> Troll - 0.11%
⠀⠀> Dvergr - 0.67%
⠀⠀> Gnome - 0.52%
⠀⠀> Goblin - 0.19%
⠀⠀> Bugbear - 0.09%
⠀⠀> Postmortal Entity (Any Type) - 0.2%
⠀⠀> Sprite / Non-corporeal Fae (Any Type) - 0.5%

[[/span]]

[[/<]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="journal"]]
**September 2nd, 2022.**
@@ @@
In an odd and morbid sort of way, this place sort of reminds me of my home. It had everything needed for success; the largest of the fae islands by far, with what used to be all the best jobs and the highest population. But even sustained contact as a nexus couldn't save many parts of the anomalous world from the Sealing, and that impact combined with the haste with which Britain cut ties plunged Frisland into a depression it's never truly emerged from.
@@ @@
Maybe that's why visiting here after the fact is so much like seeing the industry leave the Rust Belt and watching my town wither away. All the shells and skeletons of what used to breathe life into the island are still here, scrapped of meat and worn to the bone. The buildings are still here, but totally abandoned; too expensive to demolish and too hopeless to repopulate. The Alchemist's Guild headquarters still stand at the end of the street corner, though now they rarely get enough attendees to even hold their meetings. Britain's first spaceport is still here; a real piece of history, built for the Selene Project in 1876, but not a single vessel has set sail since the Foundation cut HMFSCP's colonization projects. The old castles of the Tuatha Dé Danann still stand stalwart in the countryside, but no tourists can pass the Veil to see them.
@@ @@
Some nexuses got lucky; most didn't. Frisland is far from an abnormal story. It happened a million other places too -- the Foundation couldn't prop up every Nexus we banished, after all. The transition was rocky, and God knows how many economies crashed. Just what happens when the O5s didn't see as much value in a given place and Goldbaker or the Misters Three didn't sweep in to save it.
[[/div]]


@@ @@
[[=image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a423dea78e5984d/image.png style="width: 50px;"]]
[[=]]
[[size 200%]]Brimirstað[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]-- 2022 --[[/size]]
[[/=]]
------
@@ @@

[[div class="modal"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:object-warning-box-source
|bg-image=https://i.imgur.com/ivmmaTV.png
|bg-opacity=1.0
|bg-size=105% 105%
|text-top=BY JOINT AUTHORITY OF THE OVERSEER COUNCIL, THE WINTER COURT, AND THE HOLY ÆSIR
|text-bottom=The following decree is issued, effective immediately
**Unauthorized access is forbidden.**
|object-number=⠀
]]

Following negotiation by all involved parties, a settlement upon amendment of the Veil protocol regarding accessibility of the mythohistorically significant extra-planar exclave known as Brimirstað, as of 4 July 1929. Per the stipulations of this agreement, the SCP Foundation is to provide upon request access to all north European-type mythofolkloric beings outside the purview of the Veil, residing both within and outside the Prime Earth, permission of entrance to Brimirstað from either side of the Sealing Bound, waiving regular paranormalcy preservation ordnances requiring the regulation of passage from or to outside the Prime Earth. 

However, the Foundation reserves the right of surveillance all passage in and out of the Nexus and of a permanent regulatory presence even during the requested passage of said entities so long as Veil regulators adhere to the agreed terms of the treaty. In exchange, the Winter Court and the Æsir of Asgard promise to make efforts toward the prevention of all passage by mythical entities or any other paranormal persons under their dominion into the Prime Earth or any Foundation-sanctioned extradimensional space subject to the regulations of the Veil policy save Brimirstað itself. The Winter Court and Holy Æsir have complied to the order that any suspected violation of this promise can be taken and tried fairly in the SCPF Internal Tribunal, and declare their acceptance of all consequences imposed by the verdict of that body.

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="journal"]]
**September 21st, 2022.**
@@ @@
Entered Brimirstað today; a Nexus with a small Foundation presence still stationed at the borders due to an old 1929 treaty which remains at least partially upheld to this day. For thousands of years before the Sealing, this island port was the tripartite bridge between the home of the Jötnar, the chasms of the Trolls, and the outskirts of human Scandinavia. Many of the old records say Brimirstað was made from the very top of one of the titular giant's horns sticking out of the water, Brimir (or Ymir) being the primeval entity said to be killed by Odin, Vili, and Vé who formed the Earth with its body in that tradition. It was the center of the Nordic pagan occult world and a holy site to all worshippers of the Æsir, be they human, giant, dwarf, or anyone else. To many of the old faithful, if you can still say those occult communities even continue to exist under the Veil, it still is.
@@ @@
My entrance was allowed at the gates by two sculpted men of ice; remnants of an archaic and now obsolete non-abrahamic golemancy which instructed its children mechanically with precise runic code rather than personalizing them with a Truename. The constructs blocked and followed me with their false eyes to eerie precision, giving way when I showed Foundation credentials.
@@ @@
The city has survived fine on the other side of the Veil, I suppose by constant life support from the other eight realms. The last pagans in Europe and in sundered other-Vinland a universe away traveled here for refuge, and their gods granted it with the last of their power. What seems like a hundred bismuth-tiled streets twist and turn and climb around boatinghouses and pagan stave churches; tunnels, infamously basilisk-infested, lead underground for troll residents to walk about during the daytime without turning to stone.
@@ @@
Ultimately, Brimirstað may be a success story of the transition from Prime-integrated to Nexus existence, but they still lag technologically behind the Veiled world considerably. Despite vital aid from their gods and from the faeries of the frigid north, they could hardly be fully saved in a world where those beings of old magic could no longer stand to the titanic new Foundation and its sempiternally byzantine apparatus.
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[=image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a423dea78e5984d/image.png style="width: 50px;"]]
[[=]]
[[size 200%]]Shalahur[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]-- 2022 --[[/size]]
[[/=]]
------
@@ @@

[[div class="theosophists_memo3"]]

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/CAqsEVT.png style="width: 600px;"]]

@@ @@

[[<]]
##ffffff|**Conspectus:** Shalahur is a hidden valley in Tibet, which the Society first became aware of through the Mahatmas of our founding years. The Book of Dzyan's teachings suggest the Ancient Masters have known of Shalahur for many kalpa, implying this sacred place is a primeval natural formation. We believe the Erikeshans once held domain over the area, as several shrines matching their artifice can be found here. The Society holds few of their written records, but some of the most prominent, namely the Tablets of Qhalar and the beryllium cylinders uncovered at Karakorum, the Society of the Golden Arrow have recovered and gracefully shared with us. Besides this, the Verses of Dzyan are the sole comprehensive source.##
[[/<]]

[[div class="paper"]]
[[<]]
It is known the Great Masters taught this of Shalahur:

One does not seek out the old beyuls and force them to open their doors.
But rather search within themselves and they will appear.
It is said this one was founded by an old master who had found Buddhahood under the guidance of White Tara.
The old graves of the Shiga are found here, as are the treasures of E-rikesh.
And many other things, brought here as great kings sought refuge;
First from the fearful Daeva and then the Shadow-mages of the Left Hand.
It is a sacred valley, under the custodianship of great Manjushrikirti, king of Shambhala.
[[/<]]

- Book of Dzyan
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


[[div class="journal"]]
**September 28th, 2022.**
@@ @@
This point on my trip is a sacred shrine-holding valley in the Himalayas, which documents that the Central Archive obtained from the Theosophists inform me was an ancient Buddhist sanctuary. Before the Sealing, this was a holy site that could only be reached on foot, and only on painstaking pilgrimages by the holiest men. Now, as with all the other once-sacred groves and grottos and valleys that littered the prenormal landscape, the valley has been cut from the space between the two mountains where it used to lie, and remains connected to Prime only though portal networks. 
@@ @@
The Sealing broke the natural spells kept a great many sacred groves and grottos secret, doing a great deal to the health of the faiths and occult traditions that venerated them. Here, for instance, was a place with such magic it hid itself between the Himalayas since time immemorial, revealing itself only to the wisest and most worthy ascetics. It appears an outsized effect of the imposed institution of normalcy upon the un-Veiled world in particular was the breaking of this illusion; now, many Tibetan mystics are withheld from the sacred beyuls, since forcefully reduced to base Nexus status, with the intricate weave of thaums that kept them concealed from all but the most worthy wanderers of the Earth shattered.
@@ @@
The days of mystery and miracle have faded here, and obscuring layers of high ritual can no longer hide the truth of thaumic decay. Nowadays, for better or for worse, the once-cryptic holy shrines of old are open to anyone who knows the Way.
[[/div]]



@@ @@
[[=image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a423dea78e5984d/image.png style="width: 50px;"]]
[[=]]
[[size 200%]]Ylkassa City, Teranesia[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]-- 2022 --[[/size]]
[[/=]]
------
@@ @@

[[div class="document"]]

[[<image https://i.imgur.com/czpxJHc.png style="width: 300px;"]] 
[[size 180%]]Incident Report: Naval Anomaly at Ylkassa Harbor[[/size]]

------
{{On 8 August 1878, at 17:44 hours, a fleet of the Imperial Navy demanifested at a harbor stop in the Akappān archipelago on route from the village of Hyari in Pitatia to an inland sea port in British Sahulland. For approximately 6 minutes after the disappearance event, the sun appeared to vanish from the sky across the entire First Ring.}}

{{Involvement from mage orders participating in the ongoing Occult War, in particular pirate groups operating extra-planetarily and/or outside the Welteis Permafrost, has recently seen a dramatic rise as a cause for mysterious naval disappearances. Accordingly, the KDPPA is presently in collaboration with the Royal Order of the Holy Knights of Saint Mary Selene, the Dutch Moon Company, Vril-Gesellschaft, and other esoteric exploratory organizations to determine the cause of the demanifestation.}}

{{If the vessels are verifiably determined to have been transported to another dimension, this event will be the largest recorded naval disappearance anomaly related to crossing into the Outer Lands since Magellan's doomed navigation of the Hibernal Gate.}}
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="journal"]]
**October 6th, 2022.**
@@ @@
This will be my first real foray outside the realms previously part of the so-called known world and toward those beyond the Antarctic Wall into the Outer Rings. As the destinations grow more distant, documentation of them will become less available; in the file given to me by Archival, documents referencing countries within the few occult continents frequently contacted by known-Earth humankind were relatively numerous, but beyond the First Ring especially, they become far less frequent and clear.
@@ @@
Ylkassa is a colonial port town on an island at the close end of Akappā, near the precipice of the Permafrost and the oceans of the First Ring. An //Estate Noir// document tells me it was founded by a Frenchman in the early 19th century to unload cargo from ships carrying riches while passing between the city-state ports of Geminia-Ra and the Agarthan entrances on nearby islands; a parallel source from Indonesia claims it was by a Dutchman, but with a similar time and reason. Regardless, what is known is that, for its short time in the sun, Ylkassa grew rich and cosmopolitan, particularity for its positioning in the new-new world across the Ice Wall; it was an exotic vacation spot and a luxurious destination, so long as you weren't one of the unfortunate Teranesian natives.
@@ @@
Decline was slow and disappointing after the Sealing. Many Ylkassans are descended from indigenous occult peoples and live over 200 years; it is therefore not uncommon to find those elders that experienced it within living memory. I find them drinking their sorrows away in bars and taverns and rotting away fishing on the docks. None of them, nobody, not anywhere in Greater Earth, could have seen it coming.
[[/div]]



@@ @@
[[=image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a423dea78e5984d/image.png style="width: 50px;"]]
[[=]]
[[size 200%]]Ma'ghariil Marshlands[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]-- 2022 --[[/size]]
[[/=]]
------
@@ @@

[[div style="center no-repeat ; float: center; border: solid 2px #150069; background-color: #e8e6df; width: auto; height: auto; padding: 1px 15px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 40px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/FN6gMjV.png style="width: 66px;"]]

**December 1st, 1876.**

I have traveled the world and the worlds far and wide, from herding Mokele-mbembe in the Congo, to delving into the lowest underworlds of the Mexica and dining with Patagonian giants, to hunting Thunderbird on the frontier. But perhaps never, dear reader, have I encountered such savage and untamed a biome on this Earth as where I write to you now.

These wilds lie in some outcast land languishing in some forgotten sea. None dare venture here, for they sit on the overlaying precipice of innumerable tiny tears in the great weave of Thaum, where divining lines meet at a critical precipice to allow passage to all manner of extra-planar wonders and horrors from across the realms in total dimensional anarchy. Spawn of the deepest hells and highest heavens across the multiverse emerge from the woodwork here and raze the swamp in uproarious insanity.

The inland bogs host great wargs and stampeding chimerae the likes of which I haven't laid eyes on since the mage-lord of the forest beastfolk threatened to turn me into one. Under the water, aeternal swamp lungs and tartareal warp-beasts that pour from the frantic Ways threaten to consume any who trespass upon their lakes. This morning, in fact, I was adrift across the surface of one such lake upon a man-sized lily pad when a dastardly piranha-like demon from Lord almighty knows where, nearly half my height from head to tail and with a maw of fel tusks, leaped out from the water and attempted to take me under by the arm. Thankfully, I dispelled that devil posthaste by giving him the old Thousand-Gale Kick, a move I learned from the best martial artists of the orient in the shining City of the Chrysanthemum Sun. Without any possible reprise, the foul beast was catapulted back into the depths, shock and horror cast in his cursed abyssal eyes, for he must have realized his mistake in clashing with the Great Naturalist. Upon his cowardly escape, I dialed the electric pentagram in the barrel of my plasma rifle and fired it twice into the lake to send a message to all that thing's unholy kin.

The natives are quite hearty folk, having to endure this madness -- here I have seen goblinoid clans carve out homes in the mangrove trees, and camouflaged ichthyian men living just off the shore and surfacing to hunt for food on the surface by night. I was just yesterday taken in for a meal by a kindly family of plinians, and bore witness to their revolting conditions. Many tribes on the periphery poach nine-eyed mudskippers in the begrimed coastal flats, where the silty shores are quicksand to any unexperienced wanderer and the air inhospitably humid. They showed me how they roast the fish over a spit and incant it with salvatory blessings to dispel toxins and make it safe for consumption; its innumerable tiny spines contain a potent hallucinogen, they tell me, that if not neutralized by thorough cooking and thaumic preparation will take deleterious alchemical action upon the faculties of the brain, causing it to die entirely as the cerebral fluids eventually transmute to mercury. Oh heavens, what a horrendous thing to imagine! I can only hope the alchemists of her majesty's medical academy never get their hands on such a substance.

- **T.T. Blackwood**

[[=image https://i.imgur.com/MH9n5Ho.png style="width: 400px;"]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="journal"]]
**October 10th, 2022.**
@@ @@
What little I could find about this place before attempting my trip painted a picture of a largely isolated backwater archipelago adrift in the vast Ashkarit Sea, consumed by primeval magic amid a tangling brush of primeval flora and the swamp of primordial ooze in which they dwell. I have also heard in confidence, largely from Blackwood's journals, that this area is a hotbed of interdimensional activity, where meeting ley-lines mark a confluence of the Ways. In my investigation, it appears the first characterization is at least partially true, and the second one fully.
@@ @@
Here, the sun shines a faint green and greyish clouds scatter across the horizon. This place springs with life; almost alien creatures which share a common root with those found most elsewhere in Greater Earth but which seem to have gone down an entirely different evolutionary path. The natives tell me these creatures [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6002 came from an alternate Earth connected to the Outer World by Hyperway; that a vast occulto-genetic catastrophe swept their world and erased all of their innumerably diverse kingdom], leaving only those who stumbled through the Ways and into other realms.
@@ @@
Civilizations are sparse and largely decentralized. The largest tribal kingdom is ruled by a near-human princess and walker of the astral planes. She claims to be a castaway from another alternate world [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rounderhouse-jade-proposal in which the blood-stained Daeva hailed not from the Steppes but the rainforests of Kumari Kandam] -- and to be a child of other-Daevon herself, in particular the sister of an imperial Rajmata. A likely prospect in my evaluation, given that she appears to be the only one of her kind present in Ma'ghariil.
[[/div]]

[[=image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/0a423dea78e5984d/image.png style="width: 50px;"]]

[[div class="journal"]]
**October 17th, 2022.**
@@ @@
These swamplands are harsh, and the trek across them grueling, but I finally near the end of my duties in this particular. I have recorded the significant landmarks and noted over two-hundred plant and animal species, which should be sufficient. The only region which I have yet to explore is part of the southeastern corner of the swamplands.
@@ @@
My most recent notable discovery was yesterday; a tribal confederacy of batrachian men with the heads of frogs and webbed appendages, its territory to the west of the swamps, near the habitat of the man-eating vines and strangulating willows I encountered earlier. They seem to either be immune to the treacherous plantlife in their neck of the swamp or have adapted to it so thoroughly as to use it to their own advantage, as they appear to grow and harvest the willows in large floating garden plots using fountains and other sources of flowing water built into the swamp.
@@ @@
It's reassuring, if anything, to know some of the most insular environs continued as normal after the Sealing. The damage seems to become less imminent the more obscure the lost Nexi become, as you go further and further beyond the outer permafrosts. When the Three Arrows donned over the sky, the flow of explorers like Blackwood may have stopped, but the lumbering megafauna of the marshes and the local fiefdoms of the furthest Rings, hardly contacted in the first place, likely never noticed. 
[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[>]]
[[span style="font-size: 135%;"]] [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8181/offset/4 |Act V -->]]] [[/span]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@

[[module CSS]]
/*
    BLANKSTYLE CSS
    [2021 Wikidot Theme]
    By Placeholder McD and HarryBlank
    Based on:
       Paperstack Theme by EstrellaYoshte
       Penumbra Theme by EstrellaYoshte
*/
 
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:ital,wght@0,800;1,800&display=swap');
 
#page-content { font-size: .9rem; }
 
#main-content {
    top: -1.6rem;
    padding: 0.2em;
}
 
div#container-wrap {
     background-image: none;
}
 
div#header {
    background-image: none;
}
 
#header h1, #header h2 { margin-left: 0; float: none; text-align: center; }
#header h2 { margin-top: 0.5rem; }
#header h1 span, #header h2 span { font-size: 0; display: none;}
#header h1 a::before, #header h2::before {
    color: #000;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif !important;
    text-shadow: none;
}
 
#header h1 a::before {
  content: var(--header-title, "SCP Foundation");
  font-weight: 400;
  font-size: 1.3em;
}
 
#header h2::before {
  content: var(--header-subtitle, "SECURE, CONTAIN, PROTECT.");
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1.2em;
}
 
@media (max-width: 707px) {
    #header h1 a::before {
        font-size: 1.6em;
    }
}
 
#login-status,
#login-status a {
    color: #333333;
}
 
#page-title {
    display: none;
}
 
#footer, #footer a {
    background: transparent;
    color: #333333;
}
 
#search-top-box-input,
#search-top-box-input:hover,
#search-top-box-input:focus,
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit],
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit]:hover,
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit]:focus {
    border: none;
    background: #333333;
    box-shadow: none;
    border-radius: 0px;
    color: #efefef;
}
 
#search-top-box input.empty {
    color: #999999;
}
 
#search-top-box {
    top: 2.3rem!important;
    right: 8px;
}
 
#top-bar { 
   display: flex;
   justify-content: center;
   right: 0;
   top: 7.9rem;
}
 
#top-bar, #top-bar a {
    color: #333333;
}
 
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
    font-family: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    color: #000;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
}
 
h1 {
    font-size: 2em;
}
 
h2 {
    font-size: 1.45em;
}
 
div#extra-div-1 {
    height: 180px;
    width: 100%;
    top: 0;
    position: absolute;
    background: url('https://i.imgur.com/jXnl8Pl.png');
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: 50% 50%;
    z-index: -1;
}
 
@media (max-width: 707px) {
    div#extra-div-1 {
        top: 15px;
    }
}
 
body {
    background-image: linear-gradient(
        to bottom,
        #e0e0e0, #e0e0e0 90px,
        #e0e0e0 90px, #ffffff 200px,
        #ffffff 200px, #ffffff 100%);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
 
:root {
  --timeScale: 1.5;
  --timeDelay: 1.5s;
  --posX: calc(50% - 358px - 13rem);
  --fnLinger: 1s;
}
 
#page-content hr {
    background-color: #000;
}
 
#page-content tr th {
    padding: 6px;
    border: #000 1px solid;
}
 
#page-content tr td {
    padding: 12px;
    border: #000 1px solid;
    line-height: 1.4;
}
 
#page-content .sidebox tr td, 
#page-content .sidebox tr th {
    padding: 0.35em;
}
 
#side-bar {
    border-right: 1px solid #333;
    background: #DDD;
}
 
#side-bar .side-block {
    border: 1px solid #333;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
}
 
#top-bar div.open-menu a {
    border: 1px solid #333;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
}
 
@media (max-width: 767px) {
    #side-bar:target {
        border: 1px black;
        box-shadow: none;
    }
}
 
#side-bar .side-block {
    border: 1px solid #333;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    background-color: #FDF6D7;
}
#side-bar .side-block.media {
    background-color:#D7EFE7;
}
#side-bar .side-block.resources {
    background-color:#F5D8E0;
}
 
#page-content .creditRate{
    margin: unset;
    margin-bottom: 4px;
}
#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border: solid 1px #000;
    box-shadow: none;
    border-radius: 0;
}
 
#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button .fa-info {
    border: none;
    color: #333333;
}
 
#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button .fa-info:hover {
    background: #333333;
    color: #ffffff;
}
 
.rate-box-with-credit-button .cancel {
    border: solid 1px #ffffff;
}
 
/* ---- PAGE RATING ---- */
 
.page-rate-widget-box {
    box-shadow: none;
    border: solid 1px #000;
    margin: unset;
    margin-bottom: 4px;
    border-radius: 0;
}
 
div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    color: #333333;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup,
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-top: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}
 
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a,
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a {
    background: transparent;
    color: #333333;
}
 
.page-rate-widget-box .rateup a:hover,
.page-rate-widget-box .ratedown a:hover {
    background: #333333;
    color: #ffffff;
}
 
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel {
    background: transparent;
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0;
}
 
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a {
    color: #333333;
}
.page-rate-widget-box .cancel a:hover {
    background: #333333;
    color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 0;
}
#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button .page-rate-widget-box { border: none; }
 
.anchor {
    position: sticky;
    height:0;
    top: 0;
}
.sidebox {
    padding: .14rem;
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    width: calc((100vw - 870px)/2);
    max-height: calc(100vh - 18rem);
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 103.5%;
    z-index: 5;
    overflow: auto;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
@media (max-width: 1290px) {
    .sidebox {
        display: none;
        visibility: hidden;
    }
 
    #header h2::before {
        font-size: 0.9em !important;
    }
}
 
.scp-image-block {
    box-shadow: none;
}
 
/* ---- YUI TAB BASE ---- */
.yui-navset .yui-nav a,.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a{background-color:inherit;background-image:inherit}.yui-navset .yui-nav a:hover,.yui-navset .yui-nav a:focus{background:inherit;text-decoration:inherit}.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a,.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:focus,.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:hover{color:inherit;background:inherit}.yui-navset .yui-nav,.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav{border-color:inherit}.yui-navset li{line-height:inherit}
 
/* ---- YUI TAB CUSTOMIZATION ----*/
 
 .yui-navset .yui-nav,
 .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav{
     display: flex;
     flex-wrap: wrap;
     width: calc(100% - .125rem);
     margin: 0 auto;
     border-color: #333333;
     box-shadow: none;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav a, /* ---- Link Modifier ---- */
 .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a{
     color: #333333;
    /* ---- Tab Background Colour | [UNSELECTED] ---- */
     background-color: #efefef;
     border: unset;
     box-shadow: none;
     box-shadow: none;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav a:hover,
 .yui-navset .yui-nav a:focus{
     color: #ffffff;
    /* ---- Tab Background Colour | [HOVER] ---- */
     background-color: #333333;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav li, /* ---- Listitem Modifier ---- */
 .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav li{
     position: relative;
     display: flex;
     flex-grow: 2;
     max-width: 100%;
     margin: 0;
     padding: 0;
     color: #ffffff;
     background-color: #ffffff;
     border-color: transparent;
     box-shadow: none;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav li a,
 .yui-navset-top .yui-nav li a,
 .yui-navset-bottom .yui-nav li a{
     display: flex;
     align-items: center;
     justify-content: center;
     width: 100%;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav li em{
     border: unset;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav a em,
 .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a em{
     padding: .35em .75em;
 
     text-overflow: ellipsis;
     overflow: hidden;
     white-space: nowrap;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected, /* ---- Selection Modifier ---- */
 .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav .selected{
     flex-grow: 2;
     margin: 0;
     padding: 0;
    /* ---- Tab Background Colour | [SELECTED] ---- */
     background-color: #333333;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a,
 .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a em{
     border: none;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a{
     width: 100%;
     color: #ffffff;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:focus,
 .yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:active{
     color: #ffffff;
     background-color: #333333;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-content {
    background-color: #ffffff;
    box-shadow: none;
}
 .yui-navset .yui-content,
 .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-content{
    padding: .5em;
    border: 1px solid #333;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
 
/*---- SCROLLBAR ----*/
 
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 10px;
}
 
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: #FFF;
    border-left: 1px solid #333;
}
 
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
     background: #CCC;
     border: #333 1px solid;
}
 
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
     background: #EEE;
}
 
/*---- CENTER IMAGES ON MOBILE courtesy of EstrellaYoshte and PeppersGhost ----*/
 
.imagediv {
    float: right;
    margin: 15px
}
 
@media (max-width: 540px) {
  .imagediv {
    float: none;
    text-align:center;
    margin: auto;
  }
}
 
@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
    .scp-image-block.block-right{
        float: none;
        margin: 10px auto;
    }
}
 
/*---- ACS-COLORED TABLE DIVS ----*/
 
#page-content .table1 tr th,
#page-content .table1 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: #D7EFE7;
}
 
#page-content .table2 tr th,
#page-content .table2 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: #D8ECF4;
}
 
#page-content .table3 tr th,
#page-content .table3 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: #FDF6D7;
}
 
#page-content .table4 tr th,
#page-content .table4 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: #FFDABF;
}
 
#page-content .table5 tr th,
#page-content .table5 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: #F5D8E0;
}
 
#page-content .table6 tr th,
#page-content .table6 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    background-color: rgba(146, 0, 255, 0.2);
}
 
.tableb .wiki-content-table {
    border-collapse: separate;
    border-spacing: 2px;
}
 
.tableb .scp-image-block {
    border: none;
}
 
.tableb .scp-image-block img {
    border: #000 1px solid;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
 
.tableb .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    margin-top: 2px;
    border: #000 1px solid;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
 
.top-left-box > .item {
  display: none;
}
 
/* ---- WORDS NO LONGER BROKEN, THE CROQUEMBOUCHE HAS SPOKEN ---- */
span, a { word-break: normal !important }
 
.avatar-hover { display: none !important; }
 
#breadcrumbs, .pseudocrumbs {
    text-align: center;
    padding-top: 10px;
}
 
#main-content .page-tags span {
    max-width: 100%;
}
 
/* -- FANCY THINGS from Woedenaz's Dustjacket Theme -- */
 
.fancyhr hr {
    border-top: 2vw solid transparent;
    background-color: rgba(var(--bright-accent), 0);
    height: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-image-source: url('https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/local--files/component:dustjacket-theme/wl_hr.png');
    border-image-repeat: round round;
    background: none;
    border-image-slice: 80 500 80 500 fill;
    border-image-width: 10em 80em 10em 80em;
}
 
.fancyborder {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 2vw solid rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    border-image: url('https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/local--files/component:dustjacket-theme/wl_border.png') 600 round;
    border-image-width: 6;
    padding: 2vw;
}
[[/module]]













































[[module CSS]]
:root {

    /*----------------------*/
    /*---- BEDROCK VARS ----*/
    /*----------------------*/

    --header-logo: var(--logo);
    --logo: url('https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/basalt_scp_logo-for_lightmode.svg');

    --header-title: var(--title);
    --header-subtitle: var(--subtitle);
    --title: "SCP Foundation";
    --subtitle: "SECURE - CONTAIN - PROTECT";

    --main-content-width: 60rem;
    --main-content-top-margin: 1.5rem;
    --base-font-size: .875rem;
    --bottom-area-padding: calc(var(--true-font-size)*2);
    --side-bar-width: 17rem;
    --basalt-page-content-font-weight: 440;

    --header-font-primary: var(--UI-font-primary);
    --UI-font-primary: 'Sofia Sans';

    --basalt-overtone: 10, 10, 11;
    --basalt-undertone: var(--basalt-bright-element-color);
    --basalt-UI-dark-palette: 50, 50, 51;
    --basalt-bright-element-color: 150, 24, 43;
    --basalt-dark-element-color: 105, 17, 30;
    --basalt-alternate-color: 221, 119, 17;
    --basalt-primary-color: 252, 252, 252;
    --basalt-secondary-color: 245,245,245;
    --basalt-tertiary-color: 229, 229, 238;
    --basalt-main-text-color: 35, 35, 38;

    --title-border-color: var(--basalt-overtone);
    --license-area-divider-color: var(--basalt-overtone);
    --footer-divider-color: var(--basalt-overtone);
    --search-icon-color: var(--basalt-overtone);
    --hr-color: var(--general-border-color);
    --general-border-color: 220, 220, 220;
    --rate-module-cancel-color: var(--basalt-alternate-color);
    --scrollbar-thumb-color: var(--basalt-dark-element-color);
    --modal-fader-background-color: 0, 0, 0;

    --side-bar-heading-background-color: 0, 0, 2, 0.07;
    --side-bar-media-background-color: none; /* Disabled by default */
    --side-bar-resources-background-color: none; /* Disabled by default */
    --side-bar-button-background-hover: none; /* Disabled by default */
    --side-bar-heading-text-color-hover: 255, 255, 255, 0.4;
    --side-bar-button-color-hover: var(--side-bar-button-color);

    /*---------------------*/
    /*---- BASALT VARS ----*/
    /*---------------------*/

    --basalt-UI-background-color: var(--basalt-secondary-color);
    --header-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-background-color);
    --side-bar-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-background-color);
    --bottom-area-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-background-color);
    --edit-area-ancillary-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-background-color);
    --edit-area-toolbar-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-background-color);
    --button-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-background-color);

    --basalt-UI-text-color: var(--basalt-main-text-color);
    --header-title-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --header-subtitle-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --top-bar-link-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --search-icon-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --side-bar-heading-text-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --side-bar-link-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --bottom-area-text-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --edit-area-ancillary-text-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --edit-area-toolbar-icon-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --button-text-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);
    --basalt-sub-text-color: var(--basalt-UI-text-color);

    --ACS-font: var(--header-font);
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--basalt-UI-dark-palette);
    --basalt-th-text-color: var(--basalt-light-text-color);
    --image-caption-text-color: var(--basalt-main-text-color);
    --authorbox-background-color: var(--basalt-primary-color);
    --floatbox-background-color: 240, 240, 244;
    --document-background-color: 253, 253, 253;
    --darkdocument-background-color: 30, 30, 35;

    --header-drop-shadow-opacity: 0.1;
    --window-border-radius: 8px;

/*------------------------*/
/*---- BASALT CLASSES ----*/
/*------------------------*/

:is(div.blockquote, blockquote) {
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-main-text-color));
    overflow: auto;
}

:is(div.blockquote, blockquote):has(div.floatbox) {
    overflow: unset;
}

#page-content div.notation {
    max-width: 45rem;
}

div.notation {
    display: block;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 1.4rem;
    padding-inline: 1.1rem;
    padding-block: 0.9rem;
    background-color: rgb(var(--basalt-secondary-color));
    border-left: solid 0.25rem rgb(var(--general-border-color));
    border-right: solid 0.25rem rgb(var(--general-border-color));
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-main-text-color));
}

#page-content div.modal {
    max-width: 57rem;
}

div.modal {
    display: block;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 1.4rem;
    padding-inline: 1.5rem;
    padding-block: 0.5rem;
    background-color: rgb(var(--basalt-primary-color));
    border: solid 0.2rem rgb(var(--general-border-color));
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-main-text-color));
}

#page-content div.smallmodal {
    max-width: 47rem;
}

div.smallmodal {
    display: block;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 1.4rem;
    padding-inline: 1rem;
    padding-block: 0.2rem;
    background-color: rgb(var(--basalt-primary-color));
    border: solid 0.15rem rgb(var(--general-border-color));
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-main-text-color));
}

#page-content div:is(.jotting, .transcript) {
    max-width: 42rem;
}

div:is(.jotting, .transcript) {
    display: block;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 1.4rem;
    padding-inline: 1.5rem;
    padding-block: 0.2rem;
    background-color: rgb(var(--basalt-secondary-color));
    border: dashed 0.15rem rgb(var(--general-border-color));
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-main-text-color));
}

#page-content div.papernote {
    max-width: 30rem;
}

div.papernote {
    display: block;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 1.4rem;
    padding: 1rem 2rem;
    background-color: rgb(var(--basalt-tertiary-color));
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-main-text-color));
}

#page-content div:is(.document, .darkdocument) {
    max-width: 45rem;
}

div:is(.document, .darkdocument) {
    display: block;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 1.5em;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    position: relative;
    --posX: -20vw;
}

div.document {
    background-color: rgb(var(--document-background-color));
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 1.9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0px 6px 15px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    color: rgb(50, 50, 53);
}

div.darkdocument {
    background-color: rgb(var(--darkdocument-background-color));
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 1.9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 10, 0.8), 0px 6px 15px -4px rgba(0, 0, 7, 0.9);
    color: rgb(195, 195, 200);
}

div:is(.document, .darkdocument)::before,
div:is(.document, .darkdocument)::after {
    content: "";
    height: 98%;
    position: absolute;
    width: 98%;
    z-index: -1;
}

div:is(.document, .darkdocument)::before {
    left: -5px;
    top: 4px;
    transform: rotate(-2.5deg);
}

div:is(.document, .darkdocument)::after {
    right: -3px;
    top: 1px;
    transform: rotate(1.4deg);
}

div:is(.document)::before,
div:is(.document)::after {
    background-color: rgb(var(--document-background-color));
}

div:is(.darkdocument)::before,
div:is(.darkdocument)::after {
    background-color: rgb(var(--darkdocument-background-color));
    opacity: 90%;
}

div.document::before {
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 1.9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0px 6px 15px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

div.document::after {
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 1.9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0px 6px 15px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
}

div.darkdocument::before {
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 1.9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 10, 0.8), 0px 6px 15px -4px rgba(0, 0, 7, 0.9);
}

div.darkdocument::after {
    box-shadow: 0px 1px 1.9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 10, 0.8), 0px 6px 15px -4px rgba(0, 0, 7, 0.05);
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 1020px) {

    div:is(.document, .darkdocument)::before,
    div:is(.document, .darkdocument)::after {
     display: none;
    }
}

div[class$="_memo"] {
    background: var(--memo-logo) rgba(var(--memo-color), 1);
    background-size: contain;
    background-position: top center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    min-height: 4rem;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 2rem;
    padding-inline: 20px;
    padding-block: 10px;
    border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
}

div[class$="_memo"]::before {
    content: var(--memo-heading);
    font-family: var(--UI-font);
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 1.3em;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0 auto 1rem auto;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding-top: 0.5em;
}

div.raisa_memo {
    --memo-heading: "NOTICE FROM THE RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/RAISA_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 242, 242, 192;
}

div.classification_memo {
    --memo-heading: "CLASSIFICATION COMMITTEE MEMORANDUM";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/CLASSIFICATION_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 237, 245, 243;
}

div.ettra_memo {
    --memo-heading: "NOTICE FROM THE EMERGENT THREAT TACTICAL RESPONSE AUTHORITY";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/ETTRA_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 245, 215, 215;
}

div.ethics_memo {
    --memo-heading: "ETHICS COMMITTEE MEMORANDUM";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/ETHICS_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 255, 219, 196;
}

div.temporal_memo {
    --memo-heading: "NOTICE FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF TEMPORAL ANOMALIES";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/DELTA_T_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 255, 255, 255;
}

div.overwatch_memo {
    --memo-heading: "BY ORDER OF THE OVERSEER COUNCIL";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/O5_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 227, 227, 227;
}

div.miscomm_memo {
    --memo-heading: "NOTICE FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF MISCOMMUNICATIONS";
    --memo-logo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/MISCOMM_LIGHTLOGO.png);
    --memo-color: 238, 237, 250;
}

div.tribunal_memo {
    --memo-heading: "VERDICT FROM THE INTERNAL TRIBUNAL DEPARTMENT";
    --memo-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/qavdzCV.png);
    --memo-color: 206, 237, 214;
}

div.external_memo {
    --memo-heading: "MEMORANDUM FROM THE EXTERNAL RELATIONS BOARD";
    --memo-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/Vr7NkgK.png);
    --memo-color: 228, 211, 240;
}

div.administrator_memo {
    --memo-heading: "FROM THE OFFICE OF THE ADMINISTRATOR";
    --memo-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/LMiY83P.png);
    --memo-color: 148, 148, 148;
}

div.archival_memo {
    --memo-heading: "NOTICE FROM THE ARCHIVAL DEPARTMENT";
    --memo-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/CmXPO1U.png);
    --memo-color: 175, 217, 240;
}

.table1 {
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--one-color);
}

.table2 {
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--two-color);
}

.table3 {
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--three-color);
    --basalt-th-text-color: var(--basalt-main-text-color);
}

.table4 {
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--four-color);
}

.table5 {
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--five-color);
}

.table6 {
    --basalt-th-background-color: var(--six-color);
}

div:is(.table1, .table2, .table3, .table4, .table5, .table6) .scp-image-block {
    border-bottom-color: rgba(var(--basalt-th-background-color), 0.75);
}

div.tableb :is(#page-content table:not(.form), table.wiki-content-table) {
    border-collapse: separate;
    border-spacing: 4px;
}

span:is(.bigtext, .bt) {
    font-family: var(--header-font);
    font-weight: bold;
}

span:is(.specialtext, .st) {
    font-family: var(--UI-font);
    font-weight: bold;
}

:is(.table1, .table2, .table3, .table4, .table5, .table6) span:is(.st, .specialtext) {
    color: rgb(var(--basalt-th-background-color));
}

#page-content div.floatbox {
    background-color: rgb(var(--floatbox-background-color));
    float: left;
    max-width: calc(var(--main-content-width)/2.25);
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0.25rem 1.25rem;
    margin-left: clamp(calc(var(--main-content-width)/-4.5), calc((87.5vw - 95%)/-2), 0rem);
    padding-inline: 1.2rem;
    padding-block: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.9125em;
    border-radius: 7px;
    border: solid 0.12rem rgba(var(--general-border-color), 0.4);
}

#page-content div.floatbox.right {
    float: right;
    margin-left: 1.25rem;
    margin-right: clamp(calc(var(--main-content-width)/-4.5), calc((87.5vw - 95%)/-2), 0rem);
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 640px) {
    #page-content div:is(.floatbox, .floatbox.right) {
     float: none;
     margin: 0.5rem auto;
     width: 100%;
    }
}

:is(.table-no-border, .authorbox) td {
    border-color: transparent !important;
}
[[/module]]




[[module CSS]]

div[class$="_memo2"] {
    background: var(--memo2-logo) rgba(var(--memo2-color), 1);
    background-size: contain;
    background-position: top center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    min-height: 4rem;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 2rem;
    padding-inline: 20px;
    padding-block: 10px;
    border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    text-align: center;
}

div[class$="_memo2"]::before {
    content: var(--memo2-heading);
    font-family: var(--UI-font);
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 1.3em;
    text-align: center;
    color: rgb(250, 250, 250);
    margin: 0 auto 1rem auto;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding-top: 0.5em;
}

div.triad_memo2 {
    --memo2-heading: "TRIAD HIGH COMMAND TRANSMISSION:";
    --memo2-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/AHLcSce.png);
    --memo2-color: 4, 4, 10;
}

[[/module]]



[[module CSS]]

div[class$="_memo3"] {
    background: var(--memo3-logo) rgba(var(--memo3-color), 1);
    background-size: contain;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    min-height: 4rem;
    margin-inline: auto;
    margin-block: 2rem;
    padding-inline: 20px;
    padding-block: 10px;
    border: solid 4px rgba(194, 168, 60, 255);
    text-align: center;
}

div[class$="_memo3"]::before {
    content: var(--memo3-heading);
    font-family: var(--UI-font);
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: 1.3em;
    text-align: center;
    color: rgb(194, 168, 60);
    margin: 0 auto 1rem auto;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding-top: 0.5em;
}


div.hmfscp_memo3 {
    --memo3-heading: "ON ORDER OF HER MAJESTY'S ROYAL FOUNDATION:";
    --memo3-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/yltuzQl.png);
    --memo3-color: 38,41,50;
}

div.theosophists_memo3 {
    --memo3-heading: "⠀";
    --memo3-logo: url(https://i.imgur.com/ePy9Qn9.png);
    --memo3-color: 19,41,89;
}

[[/module]]













[[module CSS]]
/* New paper class */
 
div.paper {
    background: linear-gradient(rgba(220, 240, 240, 0.3), rgba(240, 240, 220, 0.5)), url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:unusual-Cargo/TOAST-PAPER.jpg");
    box-shadow: 4px 6px 8px #a98;
    padding: 1em .5em 1em .5em;
    display: block;
    margin-block-start: 1em;
    margin-block-end: 1em;
    margin-inline-start: 40px;
    margin-inline-end: 40px;
    font-family: "Monotype Corsiva", "Bradley Hand ITC", sans-serif;
    font-size: 140%;
}
 
@media (max-width: 478px) {
    div.paper {
    margin-inline-start: 0px;
    margin-inline-end: 0px;
    margin-block-start: 0em;
    margin-block-end: 0em;
    Margin: .5em 0em .5em 0em;
    }
}







div.paper2 {
    border: none;
    padding: .5em;
    font-family: "Monotype Corsiva", "Bradley Hand ITC", sans-serif;
    font-size: 140%;
    box-shadow: 4px 6px 8px #a98;
    background: linear-gradient(rgba(255, 255, 245, 0.3), rgba(245, 230, 205, 0.5)), url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme:unusual-cargo/TOAST-PAPER.jpg");
}
[[/module]]
